description: Primes p such that x^50 = 2 has no solution mod p.
comments: Complement of A049582 relative to A000040.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
mathematica: ok[p_] := Reduce[Mod[x^50 - 2, p] == 0, x, Integers] == False; Select[Prime[Range[100]], ok] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Sep 21 2012 *)
prog: (MAGMA) [p: p in PrimesUpTo(500) | not exists{x: x in ResidueClassRing(p) | x^50 eq 2}]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Sep 21 2012
author: _Klaus Brockhaus_, Feb 02 2001
